articles.title: UN declares full-blown famine in Gaza; 2 people starve to death in 24 hours
articles.description: A global hunger monitor has confirmed a full-blown famine in Gaza City and its surrounding areas, with reports indicating that two people have starved to death within the last 24 hours, underscoring a severe humanitarian crisis. [6]

articles.title: FBI raids former national security adviser John Bolton's home in a probe to find classified records
articles.description: The FBI has reportedly searched the home of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton as part of an investigation focused on whether he illegally possessed or shared classified information. [5]

articles.title: Appeals court throws out massive civil fraud penalty against President Donald Trump
articles.description: An appeals court has overturned a significant civil fraud penalty that had been imposed on former President Donald Trump. [1]
